meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alec Fischthal Sharath Narayan Michael Borecki Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7406.

div.div:
2016 Teen Tournament final game 1.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Alec Fischthal, a junior from North Woodmere, New York
Sharath Narayan, a sophomore from Madison, Alabama
Michael Borecki, a junior from Darien, Connecticut

tr.td: MANIC PIXEL DREAM GIRLS
LOOKING AT COLLEGES
MATH MEN, MYTH MEN
HOBBIES & PASTIMES
LANGUAGES
"G" PLUS 3

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'We can visit Emerson, Simmons & Northeastern in one trip, because all those schools are in this city')

tr.td: We can visit Emerson, Simmons & Northeastern in one trip, because all those schools are in this city
